tutorial.storyIntro.name: Neon Empire Briefing
tutorial.storyIntro.text: A portal ripped open beside the Neon Empire capital world. Deploy living crystal defences and stop the alien scouts before they pour through.
tutorial.buildTower.name: Deploy Your First Tower
tutorial.buildTower.text: Click on a glowing platform to build your first tower. Each tower costs 12 energy harvested from our living crystals.
tutorial.switchColor.name: Match Enemy Colors
tutorial.switchColor.text: Select a tower to toggle its color. Matching enemies take full damage while mismatched shots only hit with 30% power.
tutorial.startWave.name: Begin the Assault
tutorial.startWave.text: Press "Next Wave" when you are ready. Survive every wave to protect the base!
tutorial.energyEconomy.name: Harvest More Energy
tutorial.energyEconomy.text: Every destroyed ship and completed wave feeds more energy into your reserves. Watch the meter to afford new towers and color switches.
tutorial.mergeTowers.name: Combine Towers
tutorial.mergeTowers.text: Build two adjacent towers of the same color and level, then press Merge Towers to fuse them into a stronger crystal.
tutorial.removeTower.name: Dismantle with a Long Press
tutorial.removeTower.text: Press and hold on a tower to scrap it. Long presses free the platform whenever you need room or the wrong color.
tutorial.scoreSystem.name: Chase High Scores
tutorial.scoreSystem.text: You earn score for every kill and for clearing waves. The HUD tracks your local best, and the Pause menu links to the global top 20 leaderboard.
tutorial.storyWave10.name: Ancient Arsenal Unlocked
tutorial.storyWave10.text: By wave 10 scientists re-arm old war relics—machineguns, railguns, and rockets—to bolster the line. Hold the portal at all costs!
